name: Employee of the Month [DEMO]
description:
[DEMO RELEASE]

----Job details----

Salary

€9 - €11 an hour

----Full Job Description----

Staff will create a warm and friendly shopping experience in the store. Staff answer questions, offer suggestions and ensure our customers know they are welcomed and cared for. Staff entertain customers and make grocery shopping an exciting adventure. Some responsibilities may include:

  • Working on teams to accomplish goals
  • Operating the cash register in a fun and efficient manner
  • Bagging groceries with care
  • Stocking shelves
  • Cleaning the store and general maintenance
  • Helping customers find their favorite products

You'll learn a lot. You're not stuck doing one task here. Each Crew Member contributes to creating a WOW customer experience by participating in all aspects of the job.

If you have a passion for money, we'd love to meet you. We can teach you the rest.

THE MONTH is an equal opportunity employer and is committed to hiring a diverse Crew.

                         - Manger

----NOTE : Must have a flexible schedule.----
